subject: Honourable Client
body:
Honourable Client      
  The $5,000 was actually  sent to you via  RIA MONEY TRANSFER
but I am  very Sorry for the whole stress as there was a mix up error in the RIA MONEY TRANSFER details sent to you.
 
 Please  reconfirm your full name, address country  and direct phone number for a follow up in  re-sending the $5,000 payment to you via RIA MONEY TRANSFER.
 
 Regards
 
LINDA CONRAD

subject: Re:   Honourable Client
body:
Hello Linda Conrad,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited about this RIA MONEY TRANSFER, although I must admit, I'm not entirely sure how it works. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about the process? 

Also, you mentioned there was a mix-up error in the details sent to me. Could you clarify what exactly went wrong? It's all a bit confusing to me.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Emery
